resources.string: A floating mod menu that provides game enhancements

1. Click the Start button to activate the mod menu
2. If asked, grant the overlay permission
3. The mod menu will appear as a floating window
4. Drag the menu by its header to reposition it
5. Toggle mods on/off as needed
6. Minimize the menu when not in use
Disclaimer: This app is for educational purposes only. Using mods in online games may violate terms of service and result in account bans.
Overlay permission is needed for the mod menu to work
Overlay permission denied. The mod menu cannot work without this permission.
